TopicTitle: lost completed contracts after upgrade to 1.1.2

Articles.Content:
After upgrading to 1.1.2, I no longer have my list of completed contracts and "accomplishments". All other info is OK (game saves, saved ships, etc.).

Normal behavior after upgrading? (This is the first time I've ever updated...newbie!! LOL).
